column4: Tourism;Phnom Penh: Reports say that Prime Minister Hun Sen today instructed authorities to suspend the entry of flights from the Philippines.------A notice today announced the suspension of flights to the Philippines from August 13.------This comes after ------13 Chinese passengers were tested positive for COVID-19------ on a flight that arrived in Cambodia on August 9.------Flights from I------ndonesia and Malaysia------ were suspended on August 1.
